activating.headline: Unexpected meeting with a former colleague
activating.story: While getting coffee, I ran into a colleague I hadn't seen in years. The conversation brought back memories from a challenging project we worked on together.

reaction.behavior: Engaged in small talk, asked about their current job.

coping.approach: Reflected on past experiences during a short walk.

post.thoughts: Realized that my career growth has been significant since then.

activating.headline: Received unexpected feedback from manager
activating.story: During the weekly check-in, my manager gave feedback about my recent work that I did not anticipate.

activating.headline: Missed a close friend's birthday party
activating.story: I realized I had completely forgotten about my friend's birthday gathering because I was caught up in work deadlines.

coping.approach: Sent a heartfelt apology message and scheduled a lunch together.

post.thoughts: Friendship can recover if I make an effort to reconnect.
